title: Devourer, trailblazer CDR bug
body: I'm sure it will be fixed next patch but as of now,   it doesnt grant CDR, I didnt screen shot it but it in fact doesnt grant CDR

replies.body: Devourer does not give CDR. probably a tooltip bug.
Devourer actually isn't supposed to grant CDR (there isn't any on it).  Is there something I am missing?

Sometimes when you buy Devourer the item tooltip will say "10% CDR" but it doesn't give u any.

I've only noticed it  a few times, but it is strange to see that on the item when you know it doesn't provide that.
on the item itsself it grants +10 CDR but doesnt provide it to your character. is all.

Is this shown in the tooltip? If so that's worth specifying. According to wiki, neither Trailblazer nor Devourer are meant to provide and CDR. Devourer is, however, the only enchant that doesn't, so maybe that's confusing you?
ya it was showing it granted cdr but wasnt providing it
no, the thing im trying to say, is before patch 4.21 when i bought devourer on trailblazer, it said for stats "50% ATK SPD, 45 DAMAGE ON HIT, 10%CDR
